full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Contract Title and Reference
* **English**: EF245-240306 - RISO Specialized health and safety services
* **French**: EF245-240306 - OCIR Services spécialisés en santé et sécurité

### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4227769536
* **Publication Date**: October 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 4, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Amendment Date**: November 27, 2023

### Contract Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for specialized health and safety services on construction sites. The selected contractor must be able to provide on-demand services in all PSPC-managed buildings and sites in the Quebec Region.

### Key Details
* The RSO is open to eligible contractors who can provide services in accordance with the requirements outlined in Annex A.
* The contract is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* The selected contractor will be required to provide security surveillance and detection services.
* The contract duration is not specified.

### Contact Information
Please submit your proposal to the tender notice on Ariba: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17742791?extsite=MTc3NDI3OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>.
Contact Andy Doucette at andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information.

### Reference Information
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contact Information: Andy Doucette, (il-lui / he-him), andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. [No phone number provided.]  [No fax number provided.] [No address provided.]

No relevant attachments are provided. The procurement category is CNST. The procurement method is competitive. The contract is governed by the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Proc
